Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown if a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control is not found in the Web form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](../../../../../../add/includes/vsprvs_md.md)] 2010, the **ReportViewer** control is an AJAX control and requires a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> on the Web form.
